DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct open label , balance , randomise , two-treatment , two-period , two-sequence , single-dose , crossover , bioequivalence study minocycline compare minocycline 100mg tablet Ranbaxy Minocin 100mg capsule healthy , adult , human , subject feed condition . A total 24 non-smoking subject ( 17 men 7 woman ) include study , 24 finish study accord protocol .
